5. Gemfibrozil: This is a medication that is used to treat high cholesterol. It works by inhibiting the absorption of dietary fats in the small intestine.
6. Lovastatin: This is another medication that is used to treat high cholesterol. It works by inhibiting the production of cholesterol in the liver.
